articles.content: Eighteen years after Frasier ended and nearly 30 since it began its finally happened. David Hyde Pierce has found a major role rich enough to tempt him back to TV. Not Niles Crane again not yet, anyw… [+12047 chars]

articles.author: Inga Parkel
articles.title: David Oyelowo says he had ‘racially coded encounter’ with ‘older white gentleman’ after Will Smith Oscars slap - The Independent
articles.description: Actor urges people not to let Oscars drama become a ‘springboard for proxy arguments in Hollywood circles about race, respectability and belonging’
articles.content:
David Oyelowo has opened up about Will Smiths slap at the 2022 Oscars, saying he fears it could impact Hollywoods ongoing push for inclusion.
The Emmy nominated actor has witnessed first-hand many d… [+1887 chars]

articles.author: James Crawford-Smith
articles.title: Americans No Longer 'Protective' of Harry and Meghan—Expert - Newsweek
articles.description: Celia Walden has told a U.K. news host that Americans no longer seem to be "protective" or "defensive" over Meghan Markle and Prince Harry.
articles.content: Author and journalist Celia Walden has told a British news channel that Meghan Markle is viewed as a "figure of fun" in the U.S. after voicing her surprise that Americans do not appear to be "protect… [+6214 chars]
